thread.title: Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City Receives Prestigious AAA Four Diamond Award
thread.title_full: Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City Receives Prestigious AAA Four Diamond Award

title: Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City Receives Prestigious AAA Four Diamond Award
text: Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City Receives Prestigious AAA Four Diamond Award By PR Newswire | 08/18/15 - 07:08 PM EDT Reprint SIOUX CITY, Iowa , Aug. 18, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City announced it has earned AAA's prestigious Four Diamond Rating, one of the most known and respected trademarks in the global travel industry. Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City is now the fourth hotel in Iowa to receive this distinction and the only property located in the tri-state region, with no Four Diamond hotels in South Dakota and only two in Nebraska . Following an unannounced and extensive evaluation by AAA's professional inspectors, the hotel was considered a premier establishment for guests. Exceptional cleanliness, comfort, and hospitality all contributed to Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City's success. The rating awarded to Hard Rock Hotel Sioux City describes the hotel as "refined, stylish with upscale physical attributes, extensive amenities, and a high degree of hospitality, service, and attention to detail." 1 of 3
